fields.description:
Description:
Pressing the "+" and "-" buttons does not pinch/zoom an image, and doesn't display an image scale. Label "Scale: undefined" appears.

Regression, does not occur in 2.0.2.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Run KitchenSink
2. Go to Base UI - Views - ScrollViews - Scrolling Zoom+Pinch
3. Click on "+" and "-"

Expected result:
Should be able to pinch and/or zoom the image, and the image scale should be displayed

Actual result:
Not able to pinch or zoom the image. Label "Scale: undefined" appears.
